profile:
Please call 613.822.7630 for service, do not request service through this website.  

Serving Ottawa and the surrounding area since 1987, Home Appliance Care provides in-home inspections and service on almost all major brands of household electrical and gas appliances. While we specialize in high-end appliances, we are trained and knowledgeable in repairing virtually any brand.

We pride ourselves in providing quality and honesty with each service experience.

If you have an appliance problem, make the right choiceâ€”call Home Appliance Care today!
